enhanced_by.reason: emitProgress() is called before onProgress() to update the progress state, ensuring that the progress callback is invoked with the latest data.
The read method updates the readPos which is used to calculate progress in onProgress(). Ensuring read is called before onProgress() ensures accurate progress reporting.
Both onProgress() and emitProgress() handle progress updates and can be used to construct assertions about the progress state.
The read method affects the readPos which is used in onProgress() to calculate progress. Assertions about readPos can inform assertions about onProgress().
